title: 'Must Buy'
body: I am using this perfume for 2 weeks now and I love the smell. You will love it if you like fruity and fresh smelling perfume. But the projection is poor and fades away very easily. Also doesn't last long at all. 30 minutes people will feel around you and then it's gone. Stays in your clothes for around 3-4 hours max, that only you could smell.

title: 'Best product to have'
body: Really nice and excellent fragrance in this Bella Vita oud white. the whole bottle is filled with perfume and no gas that's also interesting. This oud white perfume is new and really very exciting. when you apply it to your body it fills your body with a new energetic smell and even you look fresh. Really it is going to be part of my perfume collection and highly recommend this to everyone to give it a try..
